t: NLRB Doubles Down: Amazon is A Joint Employer - International Brotherhood of Teamsters
s: October 2, 2024 - (PALMDALE, Calif.) – The National Labor Relations Board Region 31 (NLRB) issued a formal complaint against Amazon affirming that the company is a joint employer of its Delivery Service Partner (DSP) drivers and has a legal duty to recognize and bargain with the Teamsters Union.

t: Amazon Labor Union members vote overwhelmingly in favor of an affiliation with the Teamsters | AP News
